bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

clearIcon.description: Customize the selection box to clear the icon
clearIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框清空图标

changeOnSelect.description: When this option is true, the value of the menu option will change for each level of the click, as shown in the above demonstration
changeOnSelect.description_zh: （单选时生效）当此项为 true 时，点选每级菜单选项值都会发生变化，具体见上面的演示

:displayRender.description: The render function displayed after selection can be displayed using #displayRender="{labels, selectedOptions}"
:displayRender.description_zh: 选择后展示的渲染函数,可使用 #displayRender="{labels, selectedOptions}"

popupClassName.description: Customize the name of the floating layer class

expandIcon.description: Customize the secondary menu expansion icon
expandIcon.description_zh: 自定义次级菜单展开图标

fieldNames.description: Customize the Options field for label name children
fieldNames.description_zh: 自定义 options 中 label name children 的字段

getPopupContainer.description: The menu renders the parent node. By default, it is rendered to the body, and if you're having trouble scrolling the menu, try modifying the scrolling area and positioning it relative to it.
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位。

loadData.description: Used for dynamic loading option and cannot be used with 'showSearch'
loadData.description_zh: 用于动态加载选项，无法与 `showSearch` 一起使用

maxTagCount.description: The maximum number of tags to display, responsive mode has a performance penalty
maxTagCount.description_zh: 最多显示多少个 tag，响应式模式会对性能产生损耗

maxTagPlaceholder.description: What is displayed when the tag is hidden
maxTagPlaceholder.description_zh: 隐藏 tag 时显示的内容

notFoundContent.description: What is displayed when the drop-down list is empty
notFoundContent.description_zh: 当下拉列表为空时显示的内容

open.description: Control the visibility and concealment of the floating layer

placement.description: The preset position of the floating layer

:showCheckedStrategy.description: Defines how the selection is backfilled. 'Cascader.SHOW_CHILD': Displays only the selected child nodes. 'Cascader.SHOW_PARENT': Displays only the parent node (when all child nodes under the parent node are selected).
:showCheckedStrategy.description_zh: 定义选中项回填的方式。`Cascader.SHOW_CHILD`: 只显示选中的子节点。`Cascader.SHOW_PARENT`: 只显示父节点（当父节点下所有子节点都选中时）。

:removeIcon.description_zh: 自定义的多选框清除图标

searchValue.description: To set the value of the search, it needs to be used in conjunction with 'showSearch'
searchValue.description_zh: 设置搜索的值，需要与 `showSearch` 配合使用

showSearch.description: Displays the search box in the selection box
showSearch.description_zh: 在选择框中显示搜索框

size.description: Enter the size of the field

:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标

:tagRender.description: Customize the tag content, which takes effect when multiple selections are made
:tagRender.description_zh: 自定义 tag 内容，多选时生效

events.name: change
events.description: Select the callback when it's done

events.name: search
events.description: Listens to the search and returns the entered value
events.description_zh: 监听搜索，返回输入的值

showSearch.name: filter
showSearch.description: 接收 `inputValue` `path` 两个参数，当 `path` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 true，反之则返回 false。

showSearch.name: matchInputWidth
showSearch.description: 搜索结果列表是否与输入框同宽

showSearch.name: render
showSearch.description: 用于渲染 filter 后的选项,可使用 #showSearchRender="{inputValue, path}"

showSearch.name: sort
showSearch.description: 用于排序 filter 后的选项

Option.name: isLeaf
Option.description: 标记是否为叶子节点，设置了 `loadData` 时有效，设为 `false` 时会强制标记为父节点，即使当前节点没有 children，也会显示展开图标
